title: proposal: add small api to support byte/string views
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

go version go1.6 linux/amd64

(rest doesn't apply, since I don't report  a bug here)

It would be nice to make it easier to define, shareable, read-only views of data from which many consumable readers can be derived.

I did expect something like https://godoc.org/github.com/nightlyone/views/bytes 
and https://godoc.org/github.com/nightlyone/views/strings in the respective bytes and strings packages of the stdlib.

These are useful in interfaces like https://godoc.org/github.com/nightlyone/views
